special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
When Into the Forgotten Skyclave enters, create two 1/1 white Ally creature tokens.
[b]3 Defense[/b] Stage 2
When this expedition reaches stage 2, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 3
Creatures you control with counters on them have vigilance.
